name: Escaping the hustle and bustle
description: You won't know it but this tour, contained within an oasis of nature, is only 10 minutes walk from Flinders Station within the CBD. Many photos can be taken along the tour, not just of the natural things we will see but also photos showing the juxtaposition between nature and the cities skyscrapers in the backdrop. Botanical Gardens is truly beautiful and varied in the plants and animals you will see. From there we will head over to the Shrine of Remembrance and then down to St Kilda Road.
